properties.title: Properties
properties.legalStatusText1: This property has been reviewed for common legal issues including title clarity, liens, and outstanding encumbrances. Our initial check does not replace a full due diligence process, but it highlights items buyers should review with a legal advisor.
properties.legalStatusText2: If any restrictions or unresolved matters are identified, our legal advisory team can assist with next steps to resolve issues and ensure a smooth transfer of ownership. Reach out to our legal advisors for a detailed verification and guidance.

whyUrbitia.title: Why Choose Urbitia?
whyUrbitia.securityDesc: Your data and transactions are protected
whyUrbitia.verifiedDesc: All listings are verified by our team

legalAdvisory.title: Legal Advisory Services
legalAdvisory.subtitle: Expert legal guidance for all your real estate transactions
legalAdvisory.introText1: At Urbitia, we understand that real estate transactions involve significant legal complexities. Our team of experienced legal professionals is here to guide you through every step of the process, ensuring your interests are protected and all legal requirements are met.
legalAdvisory.introText2: Whether you are buying, selling, or leasing property, our comprehensive legal advisory services provide peace of mind and clarity throughout your real estate journey.
legalAdvisory.service1Desc: Thorough review of purchase agreements, lease contracts, and all legal documents to protect your interests.
legalAdvisory.service2Desc: Complete property title verification, lien searches, and legal status confirmation.
legalAdvisory.service3Desc: Full legal support during closing, including document preparation and negotiation assistance.
legalAdvisory.service4Desc: Expert mediation and legal representation for property disputes and conflicts.
legalAdvisory.service5Desc: Guidance on zoning laws, building codes, and local regulations.
legalAdvisory.service6Desc: Assistance with property registration, title transfers, and legal filings.
legalAdvisory.step1Desc: Initial meeting to understand your needs
legalAdvisory.step2Desc: Comprehensive review of documents and requirements
legalAdvisory.benefit1Desc: Our team has decades of combined experience in real estate law
legalAdvisory.benefit2Desc: Clear, upfront pricing with no hidden fees
legalAdvisory.benefit3Desc: Fast turnaround on document reviews and consultations
legalAdvisory.benefit4Desc: Services available in English and Spanish
legalAdvisory.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free initial consultation with our legal team
legalAdvisory.disclaimer: Legal advisory services are provided by licensed professionals. Terms and conditions apply.
